The Mix Registration Form

Athens Church hired me to create the logo and registration form for an upcoming event called “The Mix.” It had to be a quick project with about 72 hours for concepting, design, and revisions, but I’m pretty happy with the way it all turned out.

Around here, you can visit the colophon, blog, portfolio, or things I love.
Elsewhere, you can find me on Twitter, Flickr, Pinboard, or Church Marketing Sucks.
